name: Playtesting;The Maze
description:
This game was written by David Flores, Christian Valderrama, Lauren Watson & Daniel Yin for GAM312.

For best results, please play the game in fullscreen mode. You can refresh the page to restart.
If this game has been sent to you, please do not forget to fill out the survey here.

The survey has concluded. This page is being switched to public viewing as an archive.
